title: Behaviorally Objective Online Education Design for Strengthening Medical Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and research methodologies, with experience in digital information retrieval
context.additional_context: Training on utilizing medical library resources for healthcare professionals

learning_goals: Learners will be able to search for the latest research papers related to specific diseases in the MEDLINE® database within 15 minutes
Learners will systematically categorize search results according to the PICO (Patient-Intervention-Comparison-Outcome) framework
Learners will apply the JAMA levels of evidence hierarchy to assess the credibility of medical literature
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
